title: US Passport Photo Requirements (Size/Pixels/Background) | Make Online
subtitle: 2x2 inches (51x51 mm), white background
description: Official US passport photo: 2x2 inches, head height 1 to 1 3/8 in, plain white background. Create and download online.

sections.heading: Head Proportion
sections.body: Head must be 50%-69% of the image height.

sections.heading: Background & Lighting
sections.body: Plain white background, even lighting, no heavy filters.

tips: Click 'Create Now', choose white background and 2x2 in.

title: Japan Visa Photo Size & Requirements | Make Online
subtitle: 45x35 mm, light/white background
description: Common size 45x35 mm, recent 6 months, white or light background. Auto crop and color change online.

sections.heading: Background
sections.body: White/light background, avoid shadows and glare.

title: 1-inch ID Photo Size (px/mm) & Background | Online
subtitle: 25x35 mm, ~295x413 px at 300 DPI
description: Standard 25x35 mm; choose white/red/blue backgrounds. Control DPI & file size.

sections.heading: Conversion
sections.body: 25x35 mm is about 295x413 px at 300 DPI.

sections.heading: Background
sections.body: Common colors: white, red, blue; custom RGB/HEX supported.

title: 2-inch ID Photo Size (px/mm) & Background | Online
subtitle: 35x49 mm, ~413x579 px at 300 DPI
description: Standard 35x49 mm; one-click background change and 6-inch sheet layout.

sections.heading: Conversion
sections.body: 35x49 mm is about 413x579 px at 300 DPI.

sections.heading: Tips
sections.body: Neutral expression, simple background, avoid shadows.

title: Change Photo Background to White (Online) | AI IDPhotos
subtitle: Auto matting, pure white background, one-click export
description: Upload a photo, auto remove background and set to white; tweak DPI/KB and sharpening.

sections.heading: Compliance
sections.body: Meets most ID/passport/visa requirements for white background.

title: Change Photo Background to Red (Online) | AI IDPhotos
subtitle: Auto matting and red background; HEX supported
description: Generate red background commonly used in resumes/ID; support HEX custom color.

sections.heading: Print
sections.body: Use 6-inch layout for photo paper printing.
